content:
/**
 * @module button-editor
 */
export const root = {
    'placeholder_text': 'Visit our website',
    'edit_font_face': 'Edit font face',
    'edit_font_size': 'Edit font size',
    'edit_font_color': 'Edit font color',
    'bold': 'Bold',
    'italic': 'Italic',
    'button_alignment': 'Set button alignment',
    'align_center': 'Center button',
    'align_left': 'Align button to left',
    'align_right': 'Align button to right',
    'edit_color': 'Edit button background color',
    'link': 'Link',
    'link_type_label_webpage': 'Link',
    'link_type_label_tooltip': 'Link to a webpage or email address',
    'enter_url_placeholder': 'Insert URL or email address here',
    'text_test_button': 'Test',
    'text_insert_link': 'Insert link',
    'link_text_label': 'Text to display on button',
    'title_test_button': 'Test entered link for this button',
    'text_done_button': 'Done',
    'title_done_button': 'Dismiss button toolbar'
};
